name: Girl Of Now Lovely EDP - 90ml
description:
Girl Of Now Lovely EDP - A Captivating Floral Elegance

Experience the enchanting allure of Elie Saab Girl Of Now Lovely, a fragrance that embodies feminine grace and modern sophistication. This 90ml Eau de Parfum captures the essence of youthful elegance with its irresistible blend of floral and gourmand notes. âœ¨

The Essence of Girl Of Now Lovely

Created by the renowned house of Elie Saab, this floral gourmand fragrance is a lighter, more delicate interpretation of the original Girl of Now. Perfect for the confident, contemporary woman who embraces her femininity while making a subtle statement. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 90ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Elie Saab

Captivating Fragrance Notes of Girl Of Now Lovely

Fragrance Composition
Top Notes Pear, Mandarin Orange, Neroli
Heart Notes Almond, Orange Blossom, Magnolia
Base Notes Cashmeran, Patchouli, Vanilla, White Musk

Key Features of Girl Of Now Lovely:

  • ðŸ’Ž Signature almond note reimagined in a lighter, more delicate composition
  • ðŸŒ¿ Perfectly balanced between floral elegance and sweet gourmand warmth
  • ðŸ’« Long-lasting sillage that evolves beautifully throughout the day
  • ðŸ”¥ Versatile fragrance suitable for both daytime wear and special occasions
  • âœ¨ Comes in the iconic jewel-like bottle with a pastel pink flower top

Launched in 2018, Girl Of Now Lovely is part of Elie Saab's celebrated Girl Of Now collection. The Lebanese designer, known for his exquisite couture creations, brings the same attention to detail and luxury to his best-selling fragrance line. This new arrival continues the tradition of blending oriental influences with contemporary Western perfumery.

Frequently Asked Question

How does Girl Of Now Lovely differ from the original Girl Of Now?
Girl Of Now Lovely offers a lighter, more delicate interpretation of the original formula. While it maintains the signature almond and orange blossom notes that fans love, it introduces fresh pear and mandarin top notes for added brightness. The base is softer with more prominent white musk, making it more versatile for everyday wear while still retaining the distinctive character that made the original a global success.

Indulge in the exquisite Girl Of Now Lovely EDP and let its radiant blend of floral and gourmand notes transport you to a world of elegance and feminine charm. This 90ml bottle ensures your signature scent accompanies you through countless memorable moments. ðŸŒ¸
short_description: Experience the enchanting Elie Saab Girl Of Now Lovely EDP (90ml), a delicate floral-gourmand fragrance featuring sparkling pear and mandarin, heart notes of almond and orange blossom, and a sensual base of cashmeran and vanilla. Perfect for the modern, elegant woman.
